lesson_info.title: What is Data Science
lesson_info.description: Understanding the field and its applications

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and principles of What is Data Science
Apply What is Data Science techniques in practical, real-world scenarios
Analyze the relationship between What is Data Science and other topics in Introduction to Data Science
Evaluate the effectiveness of different approaches to What is Data Science
Create solutions using What is Data Science methodologies and best practices
